content: Started working on the search implementation. Setting up Elasticsearch first.
Great! Make sure to include product categories in the search filters.
Completed the implementation. Ready for code review.
Login and signup screens are done. Working on password reset flow now.
Identified 15 high-value keywords for our target audience. Preparing content calendar.
Document upload is working. Currently integrating virus scanning API.
Chat widget integrated and styled. Needs final review before deployment.
